contentrichtext.text: '''Mondovi''' is a town in [[Buffalo County, Wisconsin|Buffalo County]] in the [[U.S. state]] of [[Wisconsin]]. The population was 449 at the 2000 census. The [[Mondovi, Wisconsin|City of Mondovi]] is located mostly within the town. ==Geography== According to the [[United States Census Bureau]], the town has a total area of 32.4 square miles (83.8 km²), all of it land. ==Demographics== As of the [[census]]{{GR|2}} of 2000, there were 449 people, 153 households, and 119 families residing in the town. The [[population density]] was 13.9 people per square mile (5.4/km²). There were 165 housing units at an average density of 5.1 per square mile (2.0/km²). The racial makeup of the town was 96.88% [[White (U.S. Census)|White]], 0.89% [[Native American (U.S. Census)|Native American]], 1.11% [[Asian (U.S. Census)|Asian]], and 1.11% from two or more races. 0.00% of the population were [[Hispanic]] or [[Latino]] of any race. There were 153 households out of which 37.3% had children under the age of 18 living with them, 67.3% were [[Marriage|married couples]] living together, 5.2% had a female householder with no husband present, and 22.2% were non-families. 14.4% of all households were made up of individuals and 3.9% had someone living alone who was 65 years of age or older. The average household size was 2.93 and the average family size was 3.29. In the town the population was spread out with 30.3% under the age of 18, 6.2% from 18 to 24, 33.0% from 25 to 44, 22.7% from 45 to 64, and 7.8% who were 65 years of age or older. The median age was 34 years. For every 100 females there were 96.1 males. For every 100 females age 18 and over, there were 110.1 males. The median income for a household in the town was $39,792, and the median income for a family was $43,250. Males had a median income of $28,438 versus $19,688 for females. The [[per capita income]] for the town was $18,672. About 5.9% of families and 7.7% of the population were below the [[poverty line]], including 11.1% of those under age 18 and none of those age 65 or over. ==References== <references /> {{Buffalo County, Wisconsin}} {{coord|44|31|59|N|91|42|59|W|region:US_type:city_source:kolossus-eswiki|display=title}} [[Category:Towns in Buffalo County, Wisconsin]]
